text: Ara niscaya'i tomadera kache tini kitabe nayila karechena ye yakhana tomara sono allahâ€Œra ayatasamuha abisbasa kara hacche o seguloke bidrupa kara hacche takhana tadera sange base theko na ye paryanta na tara an'ya kono prasange prabesa kare, nihsandeha tahale tomara'o tadera mato habe. Nihsandeha allah munaphikadera o abisbasidera sam'militabhabe ekatrita karate yacchena jahanname
